name: Fender Stratocaster
description: Iconic electric guitar with versatile tone options.
long_description: The Fender Stratocaster features three single-coil pickups, a comfortable contoured body, and synchronized tremolo system. Used by legends like Hendrix and Clapton across all genres.

name: Gibson Les Paul
long_description: Mahogany body with maple top delivers rich, sustaining tones. Humbucking pickups reduce noise while providing warm, powerful output - the choice of Slash and Jimmy Page.

name: Martin D-28
description: Premium acoustic guitar with rosewood back.
long_description: The Martin D-28 is the standard for professional acoustic guitars, featuring solid rosewood back/sides and Sitka spruce top for exceptional resonance and projection.

name: Ibanez RG550
long_description: The RG550 features a lightning-fast Wizard neck, vibrant finishes, and Ibanez's legendary Edge tremolo system. A favorite among metal and rock guitarists.

name: Taylor 314ce
long_description: Features Taylor's Expression System 2 electronics, solid Sitka spruce top, and layered walnut back/sides for crisp articulation and balanced tone.

name: PRS Custom 24
long_description: Handcrafted with stunning figured maple top, PRS's patented tremolo system, and 85/15 pickups that deliver both vintage warmth and modern clarity.

name: Fender Telecaster
long_description: The Telecaster's simple design and twangy tone made it a country music staple, later adopted by rock players for its cutting tone and durability.

name: Gretsch G5420T
long_description: Features Filter'Tron pickups, Bigsby vibrato, and that classic Gretsch look and sound - perfect for rockabilly, jazz, and alternative rock styles.

name: Epiphone SG Standard
description: Affordable version of the iconic SG.
long_description: Mahogany body and neck with Alnico Classic PRO pickups deliver that classic SG tone at a fraction of the Gibson price. Perfect for rock and blues players.

name: Yamaha Pacifica 112V
long_description: HSS pickup configuration offers versatile tones from humbucker power to single-coil sparkle. Comfortable neck and reliable hardware make this perfect for new players.

name: Gibson SG Standard
long_description: The SG's thin, lightweight mahogany body and dual humbuckers deliver powerful tones with excellent sustain. Famous for its devilish looks and comfortable playability.

name: Fender Jazzmaster
long_description: The Jazzmaster's distinctive offset body and unique tremolo system offer a different feel and sound from traditional Fender designs, popular with indie and alternative players.

name: Seagull S6 Original
long_description: Made in Canada with a pressure-tested solid cedar top and wild cherry back/sides. Features a wider nut width for comfortable fingerstyle playing.

name: ESP Eclipse
long_description: Mahogany body with set-neck construction and EMG active pickups deliver crushing metal tones with excellent sustain and playability.

name: Rickenbacker 330
long_description: The jangly tone that defined 60s rock. Features Rickenbacker's unique single-coil pickups and stereo output option for expansive tones.

name: Gibson J-45
long_description: Gibson's most popular acoustic features a round-shoulder dreadnought body with warm, balanced tone perfect for both strumming and fingerpicking.

name: Charvel DK24
description: Shred machine with compound radius neck.
long_description: Super-fast roasted maple neck, Seymour Duncan pickups, and Gotoh locking tuners make this a performance powerhouse for metal and rock players.

name: Fender Player Jazz Bass
long_description: Slim neck profile and dual single-coil pickups deliver the classic Jazz Bass tone - punchy mids with smooth highs, perfect for any musical style.

name: Music Man StingRay
long_description: Active electronics and powerful humbucker deliver the StingRay's signature growl. The 3-band EQ provides extensive tone shaping capabilities.

name: Squier Classic Vibe '50s Strat
long_description: Vintage specs including alnico pickups, soft V-shaped neck, and period-correct styling deliver classic Fender tones at an affordable price.

name: Pearl Export Series
long_description: Pearl's best-selling kit features poplar shells, durable hardware, and professional features at an affordable price. Perfect for both practice and performance.

name: Tama Superstar Classic
long_description: 100% birch shells deliver focused tones with enhanced projection. Features Tama's Star-Cast mounting system for maximum resonance and tuning stability.

name: DW Collectors Series
long_description: Made in the USA with Keller maple shells, True Pitch tension rods, and DW's legendary attention to detail. The choice of professional drummers worldwide.

name: Ludwig Classic Maple
long_description: 100% maple shells with vintage-style construction deliver warm, resonant tones. Features Ludwig's legendary build quality and classic aesthetics.

name: Gretsch USA Custom
long_description: Handcrafted in South Carolina with thin 6-ply maple shells, 302 hoops, and legendary Gretsch sound. The ultimate in vintage-inspired drum craftsmanship.

name: Sonor SQ2
long_description: Fully customizable with select maple, beech, or birch shells. Precision German engineering meets unparalleled craftsmanship for the ultimate drumming experience.

name: Yamaha Stage Custom
long_description: 100% birch shells deliver professional sound at an affordable price. Features Yamaha's reliable hardware and excellent build quality.

name: Mapex Armory
long_description: SONIClear bearing edges and hybrid shell composition (birch and maple) offer versatility across musical genres with focused tones and excellent projection.

name: PDP Concept Maple
long_description: 100% North American maple shells with professional features like 2.3mm triple-flanged hoops and Opti-Loc suspension mounts at an intermediate price point.

name: Pearl Masters Maple Complete
long_description: Pearl's flagship maple series features hand-selected North American maple shells with Reference-style hardware for unparalleled tone and durability.

name: Tama Starclassic Walnut/Birch
description: High-end drums with unique shell composition.
long_description: Walnut/birch hybrid shells deliver warm lows with focused mids and crisp highs. Features Tama's Star-Cast mounting system for maximum resonance.

name: Ludwig Vistalite Zep Set
long_description: Made famous by John Bonham, these transparent acrylic drums deliver explosive projection with deep, resonant tones and vintage Bonham-style configuration.

name: Gretsch Renown
long_description: USA Custom-inspired design with 7-ply maple/gumwood shells and 302 hoops deliver professional tone at a more affordable price point.

name: DW Design Series
long_description: Performance-focused features like True Pitch tension rods and 100% North American maple shells make this an excellent value in professional drums.

name: Sonor AQX Apex
long_description: German engineering meets affordable pricing with select maple shells and Sonor's precision hardware for excellent tuning stability and tone.

name: Pearl Decade Maple
long_description: Professional features like 6-ply 100% maple shells and Pearl's Opti-Loc suspension mounts at a mid-level price point.

name: Tama Imperialstar
long_description: Quality Tama hardware and poplar shells make this an excellent choice for beginning drummers looking for reliable performance.

name: Ludwig Breakbeats
long_description: Designed for portability with a small 16 bass drum but packed with big sound. Perfect for jazz, hip-hop, and small venue performances.

name: Yamaha Rydeen
long_description: Quality Yamaha construction with poplar shells and sturdy hardware makes this an excellent starter kit with room to grow.

name: Pearl Roadshow
long_description: Includes everything a first-time player needs - drums, hardware, cymbals, and throne - all from Pearl's reliable Roadshow series.

name: Yamaha P-125
long_description: Features Graded Hammer Standard action and Pure CF Sound Engine for authentic acoustic piano experience. Built-in speakers and USB audio interface included.

name: Roland FP-30
long_description: PHA-4 keyboard with escapement and ivory feel. SuperNATURAL piano engine delivers rich, expressive tones. Bluetooth MIDI for wireless connectivity.

name: Korg Kronos 2
long_description: Nine sound engines including SGX-2 piano and HD-1 synth. 16-track sequencer with 200+ built-in sounds. 61-key RH3 weighted action.

name: Nord Stage 3
long_description: Triple engine architecture (piano, organ, synth) with seamless transitions. 88-key Hammer Action Portable keyboard with aftertouch.

name: Casio PX-S1000
long_description: Only 4.7inch deep with 88-key Smart Scaled Hammer Action. Multi-dimensional Morphing AiR sound source with 192-note polyphony.

name: Korg SV-2
long_description: Authentic electric piano, clavinet, and vintage keyboard sounds. RH3 weighted hammer action with aftertouch. Built-in tube preamp.

name: Roland RD-2000
long_description: Dual sound engines (SuperNATURAL and V-Piano) with 88-key PHA-50 hybrid wood/plastic action. Extensive controller capabilities.

name: Yamaha Montage 8
long_description: Motion Control Synthesis with 88-key Balanced Hammer action. 128-note polyphony and 10GB flash memory for sample libraries.

name: Korg PA1000
long_description: 61-key synth action with 7inch touchscreen. 1500+ sounds and 400+ styles. Real-time control with joystick and assignable buttons.

name: Nord Electro 6
long_description: Vintage organ, piano, and synth sounds in lightweight package. 73-key semi-weighted waterfall keyboard with aftertouch.

name: Roland Juno-DS88
long_description: 88-key weighted action with 128-voice polyphony. 1100+ sounds including supernatural acoustic tones and synth waveforms.

name: Yamaha MX88
long_description: 88-key weighted action with 128-note polyphony. Includes over 1000 voices from Yamaha's Motif series. USB audio/MIDI interface.

name: Korg B1SP
long_description: 88-key weighted hammer action with included stand and pedal. 8 premium acoustic piano sounds with 120-note polyphony.

name: Casio CT-X700
long_description: 61-key synth action with 600 built-in tones and 195 rhythms. AiX Sound Source provides realistic instrument sounds.

name: Roland GO:KEYS
long_description: 61-key unweighted action with Bluetooth MIDI. Loop Mix function lets you create songs easily. Battery-powered for portability.

name: Korg microKEY Air
long_description: 37-key synth action with Bluetooth MIDI connectivity. Includes Korg's natural touch keyboard for expressive playing.

name: Arturia KeyLab Essential
long_description: 49-key synth action with aftertouch. Includes Analog Lab software with 6500+ sounds. DAW integration and assignable controls.

name: Native Instruments Komplete Kontrol
long_description: 49-key semi-weighted with aftertouch. Deep integration with Komplete software. Includes 1500+ sounds and Light Guide for workflow.

name: Alesis Recital Pro
long_description: 88-key hammer action with adjustable touch response. 12 premium voices including acoustic pianos, electric pianos, and strings.

name: Kawai ES520
long_description: 88-key Responsive Hammer Compact II action with wooden keys. SK-EX and EX concert grand piano samples with 192-note polyphony.

name: Shure SM58
long_description: The world's most popular vocal mic with tailored frequency response and built-in spherical filter to minimize breath/wind noise while delivering crisp vocals.

name: Neumann U87
long_description: Large-diaphragm condenser with three polar patterns, low-noise circuitry, and legendary Neumann sound quality. The gold standard for vocal recording.

name: Audio-Technica AT2020
long_description: Cardioid condenser microphone with custom-engineered low-mass diaphragm for extended frequency response and superior transient response.

name: AKG C414 XLII
long_description: Nine selectable polar patterns and three pad/rolloff settings make this ideal for vocals, instruments, and studio applications. Transparent, detailed sound.

name: Sennheiser MD 421 II
long_description: Five-position bass roll-off switch and presence peak for tailored frequency response. Ideal for vocals, drums, and brass instruments.

name: Rode NT1-A
long_description: 1 gold-sputtered capsule with cardioid polar pattern. Includes shock mount and pop filter. Ultra-low self-noise of 5dBA.

name: Shure Beta 52A
long_description: Supercardioid dynamic microphone optimized for low-frequency reproduction. Ideal for kick drums and bass amplifiers with enhanced low-end response.

name: Blue Spark
long_description: Large-diaphragm condenser with vintage-inspired design. Focus Control switch adjusts polar pattern for different recording situations.

name: Sennheiser e609
long_description: Flat-profile dynamic microphone perfect for miking guitar amps. Supercardioid pattern rejects off-axis noise while capturing amp tone accurately.

name: Electro-Voice RE20
long_description: Variable-D technology minimizes proximity effect for consistent tone. Internal pop filter and humbucking coil for clean recordings.

name: AKG C12 VR
long_description: Recreates the legendary C12 sound with dual-diaphragm capsule and tube electronics. Nine selectable polar patterns for versatile recording.

name: MXL 990
long_description: Large-diaphragm condenser with cardioid pattern. Includes shock mount for home studio use. Great for vocals and acoustic instruments.

name: Shure SM7B
long_description: Popular for vocals, podcasts, and broadcasting. Smooth, flat frequency response with bass roll-off and presence boost controls.

name: Telefunken M80
long_description: Supercardioid dynamic mic with detailed sound reproduction. Hand-built in USA with custom-wound transformer and premium components.

name: Heil PR 40
long_description: Wide frequency response (28Hz-18kHz) for a dynamic mic. Excellent for vocals, voice-over, and instruments with minimal proximity effect.

name: Sennheiser MK 4
long_description: Cardioid pattern with warm, detailed sound. Gold-sputtered 1inch diaphragm and low-noise circuitry for professional recordings.

name: Audio-Technica AT4050
long_description: Three selectable polar patterns (cardioid, omnidirectional, figure-8). Handcrafted in USA with dual large-diaphragm capsules.

name: Rode NT5
long_description: Small-diaphragm condenser mics ideal for acoustic instruments, drum overheads, and stereo recording. Includes shock mounts and pouches.

name: Shure KSM32
long_description: True condenser design with transformerless electronics for transparent sound. Excellent for vocals and acoustic instruments.

name: MXL V67G
long_description: Gold-sputtered 1 diaphragm with cardioid pattern. Includes shock mount and carrying case. Surprisingly good quality for the price.
